I am a new Ubuntu user. I started to go fulltime Ubuntu at my house in August 2007 with Feisty Fawn. I have a desktop that I built that is my main machine. It is Ubuntu 7.04 with a small Windows partition to play World of Warcraft until I can get it running in Wine satisfactorily. I have a ThinkPad T43 for my work laptop and it is dual-booting Windows XP SP2 and Ubuntu 7.10.

I have been married for 12 years and I have <nowiki>[[http://urltea.com/1w70|two beautiful kids]]</nowiki>, a <nowiki>[[http://urltea.com/1w71|5 years old boy]]</nowiki> and a <nowiki>[[http://urltea.com/1w73|20 month old girl]]</nowiki>.
